titleStmt.title: The vindicator vindicated, or, A sur-rejoynder on behalf of Sir Thomas Player, &c. against the calumnies of H.B. alias N.R. alias P.K. alias S.P. in a late pamphlet learnedly entituled An answer in defence of a reply.
titleStmt.author: H. B., Citizen of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
